faqs.question: What is the total size of the property?
faqs.answer: The villa has a total size of 220 square meters, with 110sqm on the ground floor and another 110sqm in the self-contained basement.

faqs.question: How many bedrooms and bathrooms are there?
faqs.answer: There are 5 bedrooms, sleeping 10 people, and 5 bathrooms. Each bedroom has its own dedicated air conditioning.

faqs.question: Is there a pool and hot tub?
faqs.answer: Yes, the villa features a large 9x5 meter heated pool and a private hot tub with 100% privacy.

faqs.question: What are the local amenities?
faqs.answer: The villa is situated in a prestigious and quiet area of Lanzarote, just a 15-minute walk from the best local beaches and restaurants.

faqs.question: Is there parking available?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is private, gated parking with space for two vehicles.

location.title: Prime Location in Lanzarote
location.description: Villa Luar is situated in a peaceful residential area of Playa Blanca, offering the perfect balance of tranquility and convenience. Just a short distance from the stunning Papagayo beaches and the vibrant Marina Rubic√≥n, you have easy access to the best the island has to offer.

textContent.heroSubtitle: A luxurious 5 double bedroom villa in Residential Costa Papagayo, Playa Blanca, Lanzarote, where modern comfort meets spectacular volcanic landscapes.
textContent.aboutText: Nestled in a prestigious and quiet area of Lanzarote, Villa Luar is more than a home; it's an exclusive retreat. This beautifully designed residence offers stunning volcanic mountain views, ultimate privacy, and a seamless blend of modern architecture with the island's natural beauty. Every detail has been crafted to provide an experience of comfort, elegance, and serenity.

features.name: Large Heated Pool
features.detail: Enjoy the 9x5m heated pool year-round with mountain views.

features.name: Private Hot Tub
features.detail: 100% privacy for evening relaxation under the stars.

features.name: Fully Equipped Gym
features.detail: Stay active with our selection of modern fitness equipment.

features.name: 5 Air-Conditioned Bedrooms
features.detail: Each bedroom is a private, air-conditioned suite.

features.name: High-Speed Wi-Fi
features.detail: Complimentary high-speed internet throughout the property.

features.name: Secure Gated Parking
features.detail: Private parking area with space for two vehicles.

textContent.considerationsText:
To access the villa there is a path which is 100cm wide, there is also a ramp down to the lower ground floor patio doors, however this ramp is quite steep. Please bear this in mind.

The front door has a width of 74cm whilst the door to the terrace is 76cm wide. There is 1 step up to the front door.

The path to the pool area is 400cm wide, where the terrace is flat and tiled. There is 1 small step over the patio doors. The pool itself requires step access.

The bedrooms on the ground floor have a door width of 67cm, whilst the master bathroom door is 67cm wide.

There are 17 steps to the lower ground floor (external access only), where the door into the largest bedroom is 70cm wide, and the shower room door is 74cm wide. The door into the lounge/kitchen is 74cm wide.

The ground floor is level with the pool area.

*Please note that although every effort has been made to ensure the information provided is accurate, errors can occur and if you need to find out more specific information about the villa, please do not hesitate to contact us.
